directions: Toss cucumber, serrano chile pepper, red onion, and mint together in a bowl. Pour lime juice and grapeseed oil over the cucumber mixture; toss to coat. Add sugar, salt, and black pepper; stir.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 large cucumber - halved lengthwise, seeded, and cut into bite-size pieces
1 serrano chile pepper, seeded and minced
1/4 cup chopped fresh mint, or to taste
1 tablespoon grapeseed oil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Cucumber Chili Salad
